evidence.source_document: Motion for a Preliminary Injunction and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: In October 2023, Plaintiff Erie County, New York, applied for a grant from Defendant Corporation for National and Community Service (“Americorps”).

extracted.value: In October 2023, Plaintiff Erie County, New York, applied for a grant from Americorps.

evidence.source_document: Motion for a Preliminary Injunction and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: In January 2024, Americorps approved the grant.

extracted.value: In January 2024, Americorps approved the grant.

evidence.source_document: Motion for a Preliminary Injunction and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: One year worth of funding was to be distributed immediately, and the term of the grant would run three years so long as Erie County remained in compliance with the grant terms.

extracted.value: One year worth of funding was to be distributed immediately, and the term of the grant would run three years so long as Erie County remained in compliance with the grant terms.

evidence.source_document: Motion for a Preliminary Injunction and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: Since 1999, Retired and Senior Volunteer Program (“RSVP”) grant applicants have been required by Americorps’ own regulations to “secure community participation in local project operation by establishing an Advisory Council . . . [o]f a diverse composition that reflects the demographics of the service area.” 45 C.F.R. § 2553.24(a)(5).

extracted.value: Since 1999, RSVP grant applicants have been required by Americorps’ regulations to secure community participation by establishing an Advisory Council of a diverse composition that reflects the demographics of the service area.

evidence.source_document: Motion for a Preliminary Injunction and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: In compliance with this requirement, Erie County’s 2023 application explained its efforts to secure the participation of Erie County’s diverse population in its volunteer efforts.

extracted.value: Erie County’s 2023 application explained its efforts to secure participation of Erie County’s diverse population in its volunteer efforts.

evidence.source_document: Motion for a Preliminary Injunction and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: Americorps was founded in 1993 to promote volunteerism and national community service, but RSVP traces its origins to the Older Americans Act of 1969, in which Congress sought to promote the involvement of older Americans (then defined as 60 years or older) in addressing local problems.

extracted.value: Americorps was founded in 1993 to promote volunteerism and national community service.

evidence.text: RSVP traces its origins to the Older Americans Act of 1969, in which Congress sought to promote the involvement of older Americans (then defined as 60 years or older) in addressing local problems.

evidence.source_document: Motion for a Preliminary Injunction and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: By the late 1980’s, more than 400,000 senior volunteers were serving in approximately 750 RSVP projects across the country, and by the mid-2000s into the present-day RSVP programs have seen up to half a million volunteers working in a year in almost every state.

extracted.value: By the late 1980’s, more than 400,000 senior volunteers were serving in approximately 750 RSVP projects across the country.

evidence.text: RSVP provides high-quality, meaningful volunteer experiences that enrich their lives and promote their health.

extracted.value: RSVP provides high-quality, meaningful volunteer experiences that enrich lives and promote health.

evidence.text: RSVP does this through a wide range of volunteering activities, from delivering meals through the well-known Meals on Wheels program, to promoting disaster preparedness and helping older Americans with their taxes.

extracted.value: RSVP carries out volunteer activities through Meals on Wheels, disaster preparedness, and helping older Americans with taxes.

evidence.source_document: Motion for a Preliminary Injunction and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: On February 12, 2025, in response to two executive orders, Americorps “reviewed” Erie County’s grant applications and concluded that because the application “includes the following terms . . . Diversity, Equity[, and] DEI,” Erie County was required to do one of three things: It could “reply all to this letter by email by February 19, 2025” and “copy and paste this statement . . . ‘I certify that RSVP of Erie County . . . complies with all administration Executive Orders and does not include any…’

extracted.value: On February 12, 2025, Americorps reviewed Erie County’s grant applications and concluded that the application includes DEI terms, requiring Erie County to respond by February 19, 2025.

evidence.source_document: Motion for a Preliminary Injunction and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: On February 21, 2025, the United States District Court for the District of Maryland preliminarily enjoined federal agencies’ compliance with the executive orders on the grounds that they likely violate the First and Fifth Amendments without addressing whether the orders or agency actions implementing them violate the Administrative Procedures Act.

extracted.value: On February 21, 2025, the United States District Court for the District of Maryland preliminarily enjoined federal agencies’ compliance with executive orders.

evidence.source_document: Motion for a Preliminary Injunction and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: In response to that preliminary injunction, Americorps agreed to suspend its review of Erie County’s existing grant application.

extracted.value: Americorps agreed to suspend its review of Erie County’s existing grant application.

evidence.source_document: Motion for a Preliminary Injunction and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: Americorps maintained that Erie County’s renewal application remained subject to the requirements of Americorps’ February 12 action, and on March 18 the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit stayed the National Association injunction pending appeal.

extracted.value: Americorps maintained that Erie County’s renewal application remained subject to the requirements of Americorps’ February 12 action.

evidence.source_document: Motion for a Preliminary Injunction and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: On March 18 the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit stayed the National Association injunction pending appeal, National Association of Diversity Officers in Higher Education v. Trump, No. 25-1189, Dkt. No. 29 (4th Cir., Mar. 19, 2025).

extracted.value: On March 18, the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit stayed the National Association injunction pending appeal.

evidence.source_document: Motion for a Preliminary Injunction and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: Erie County now faces the imminent harm of being forced to make a false certification or forfeit a grant to which it is entitled.

extracted.value: Erie County now faces imminent harm of being forced to make a false certification or forfeit a grant to which it is entitled.

evidence.text: On January 20, 2025, President Trump signed an executive order directing government officials to eliminate “DEI,” “DEIA,” and “environmental justice” from the federal government, including by shuttering all “DEI,” “DEIA,” and “environmental justice” offices, positions, and functions.

extracted.value: On January 20, 2025, President Trump signed an executive order directing government officials to eliminate “DEI,” “DEIA,” and “environmental justice” from the federal government.

evidence.text: The purpose of the grant—called an "RSVP" grant, or Retired and Senior Volunteer Program—is to support older people in the Buffalo area, who may struggle to get out of the home, by creating a network of senior volunteers to check in on their wellbeing and drop off homemade meals, a program commonly known as Meals on Wheels.
